content: of amigurumi then trim the tail tip the row done in the back loop only helps the pot hold its shape and creates separation between the base and edge if the work is inside out that blo row won t be as visible groot | https //53stitches com 6 of 8 assembly that s the crochet portion done now time for assembly luckily it s pretty straightforward for this guy the trickiest part is the hair find the centre of the hair piece and pin that to the centre of the forehead then use pins to decide placement of the rest of it creating a crown i like to put it quite low down on the head close to the eyes that way it looks more in line with the shape of the head then use the tails of the hair thread it onto your yarn needle and sew it into place after attaching all of the hair all that s left is to attach the arms to the body and the body to the head tip you could try to put jewellery wire or pipe cleaners in his arms to make them pose- able but i usually don t bother since they re a little too small then place him into his little pot plant and he s ready to dance groot | https //53stitches com 7 of 8 i hope you ve had fun and congratulations on finishing i love seeing all of the finished creations so be sure to tag #53stitches 53stitches www 53stitches com groot | https //53stitches com 8 of 8
